version_description: - Bug Fixes

• Improved Player
Autoplay next lesson after finishing the current lesson.
Keep screen active while watching video.
• Push notifications handling
• Bug fixes

• Get relevant courses on course screen.
• Course screen UI design changes.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Get Unacademy Plus live courses details in home feed.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- My lists feature added.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- My lists feature added.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Learners can now watch live classes in-app.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Critical bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- New and improved native player
- Performance improvement

- Bug fixes

- Learners can now view their attendance during live class

• Redesigned Unacademy Learning app.
• Home Feed - Discover recommended courses based on Goals and Educators you follow
• My Library - All your saved courses, lists, downloads and more in one convenient place
• Plus - Discover & Purchase Plus courses from the app
• Profile - Easily access your Streak, Messages, Leaderboard and Settings Introducing Unacademy Knowledge Hats! Dedicate your learning achievements to your favourite Educators
• Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Discussion forum for plus courses
- Bug fixes

• Introducing a new learning experience - Unacademy Plus Subscription
• Get unlimited access to top educators and structured courses through your subscription
• Introducing poll during live classes
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Revamped educator profile, now access all the Plus & Free courses, Special Classes and activity stats of your favourite educator at one place.
• Introducing Practice Section for plus learners. Now you may browse by topics, find interesting questions to solve. Channel your learning into practice.
• Introducing all new updates section for plus learners. Now get all your notifications and reminders from plus courses in one place.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
